response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this product for $1,250,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your potential as a discerning buyer and aligns closely with the product's true market value. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing the details further if you decide to proceed.", "product_price": 1250000}
